snippet: Yu Darvish, the Japanese starter, kept wiggling out of trouble, and hits by Josh Hamilton and Adrian Beltre helped Texas defeat the Twins.
abstract: MLB Roundup; Texas Rangers beat the Minnesota Twins, 6-2; other MLB scores noted.
lead_paragraph: Yu Darvish, the Japanese starter, kept wiggling out of trouble, and hits by Josh Hamilton and Adrian Beltre helped Texas defeat the Twins.

headline.seo: No Decision for Darvish, but a Win for the Rangers
headline.main: No Decision for Darvish, but a Victory for Texas
headline.print_headline: No Decision For Darvish, But a Victory For Texas
